Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo is unrelated to the Covid-19 outbreak in Hong Kong.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading photo with no connection to the Covid-19 cluster.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by the person in the photo and his sister, stating that the photo was taken in Thailand and not in Hong Kong.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo is evidence of an employee of the gym linked to the Covid-19 cluster, which is a problematic assumption given the lack of evidence and the alternative explanation provided.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating bias in the claim.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration bias in the claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.
